name: Ani-Sync
description: Synchronize anime watch status between Jellyfin and anime tracking sites.

versions.changelog: 1. Fixed AniList related bugs. 2. Fixed Shikimori related bugs. 3. Fixed issue with library checks.
1. Fixing issues around marking seasons/episodes as watched. 2. Redirect user on successful auth 3. Shikimori support 4. Anime detection changes
